features_title: Set up your favorite features in minutes
features_subtitle: eMenu QR tools are simple to manage, even without technical skills. Restaurant managers can create unlimited QR codes, update menus anytime, and choose from a wide range of features tailored to their needs.
custom_branding_desc: Customize your menu with brand colors, logo, and images. Host it on your domain for a complete branded experience—managed from the admin panel.
dynamic_display_desc: Switch seamlessly between different menus for day, night, or special events—all using a single dynamic QR code.
smart_search_desc: Guests can quickly find dishes by typing keywords or applying filters such as vegetarian, vegan, or dairy-free.
rich_media_desc: Enhance your menu with high-quality photos and videos to entice customers and increase sales.
special_offers_desc: Highlight offers with custom banners on your menu or website. Add discounts, expiry dates, and time-limited deals to attract more orders.
featured_products_desc: Pin selected items to the top of your menu to showcase bestsellers, chef's specials, or high-margin products.
marketing_promotions_desc: Run pop-up campaigns with targeted images or videos to upsell items or promote upcoming events.
guest_feedback_desc: Collect valuable guest feedback through custom questions and link directly to Google reviews for authentic ratings.
social_media_desc: Add social media links, including WhatsApp for direct inquiries, so guests can connect with your restaurant instantly.
waiter_call_desc: For dine-in customers, a quick 'Call Waiter' button allows guests to request assistance without leaving the table.
secure_payments_desc: Enable guests to pay through multiple gateways directly from their devices—safe, fast, and cashless.
location_maps_desc: Display your restaurant's location with integrated Google Maps for easy navigation.
